topic.title: Upgrade matrix
topic.shortdesc: The supported Couchbase Server upgrade path is from one major version to the next.

body.p: Be aware of the currently supported versions and versions at or near their end of life. This information is available in the Couchbase Support Policy.
Upgrade to the latest available next major version until you reach your target version. The following table shows some commonly supported upgrade paths:

row.entry: Upgrade from version 2.5.x directly to version 3.1.0 using any supported upgrade strategy
Upgrade from version 3.1.0 directly to version 4.0.0 using any supported upgrade strategy
Upgrade from version 2.5.x directly to version 3.1.0 using any supported upgrade strategy, then upgrade from version 3.1.0 to version 4.0.0
